name: Cyborg Killer Москва 2042
description:
In the year 2042 the city of Moscow has turned into a toxic juggernout under the control of the AI Vladibot Putron.
You play Yuri Kalashnikov, a detective whose son has disappeared under mysterious circumstances. The trail leads you to the polluted city center of Moscow, where you have to face enemy cyborgs, infested psychopaths and androids to stop Vladibot Putron.
What dangers will await you? Who is the real mastermind behind Vladibot Putron? Can you stop the nuclear destruction?

Combat cyborgs, androids, holograms and psychopaths, as well as two end bosses, race through the landscape with your experimentally tuned cyber sports car and fight your way through the contaminated zone to the reactor to save Russia.

Use different firearms to fight your way through several locations, inluding
- The toxic outlands
- downtown Moscow
- The contaminated zone
- The power plant

Uncover the secret behind Vladibot Putron and safe your son.
